custom-sql.sql: SELECT Lims_Settings.sid AS sid, Lims_Settings.userId AS userId, Lims_Settings.presence AS presence, Lims_Settings.presenceUpdatedAt AS presenceUpdatedAt, Lims_Settings.mute AS mute, Lims_Settings.chatEnabled AS chatEnabled, Lims_Settings.adminAreaOpened AS adminAreaOpened FROM Lims_Settings ORDER BY Lims_Settings.sid
SELECT Lims_Panel.pid AS pid, Lims_Panel.userId AS userId, Lims_Panel.activePanelId AS activePanelId FROM Lims_Panel ORDER BY Lims_Panel.pid

SELECT Lims_Conversation.cid AS cid, Lims_Conversation.conversationId AS conversationId, Lims_Conversation.conversationType AS conversationType, Lims_Conversation.updatedAt AS updatedAt FROM Lims_Conversation ORDER BY Lims_Conversation.cid
